name: Cat Window Perch Hammock

This heavy-duty hammock perch mounts to any glass window with industrial-strength suction cups, giving your cat the perfect vantage point to watch birds, people, and the world go by. It is like cat TV, but better. Ideal for high-rise HDB and condo living where outdoor access is limited.
